name: Ares Omega
description: Ares Omega is a top-down rogue-lite shooter. You play as a soldier fighting against a robot rebellion on Mars. Explore procedurally generated levels, upgrade 45 skills across 3 skill trees, and find over 50 different weapons to help you destroy the robot leaders.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8/8.1, Windows 10 (32/64bit) Processor: Intel E5700 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 440 GT or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
